column4: I'm facing problem installing VLC media player--- it's giving message of "failed to download package file-- Check your Internet connection" Can anyone help me on this?
I'm facing problem installing VLC media player--- it's giving message of "failed to download package file-- Check your Internet connection" Can anyone help me on this?
Yes this is pinging. My Internet connection is OK and I'm browsing fine.
Also do you have a vlc ppa or something?
Ok let me try. no I don't have any vlc ppa
after updating I tried to install it from ubuntu software center. It is not installing.
Try with apt-get and produce the output
I'm very new user. I don't know how to do that. could you please give me step by step solution?
type "sudo apt-get install vlc" without quotes
it is working means installing through terminal.
it is done. thanks a lot dear.
